text: Surat Quraysh (Arabic: سورة قريش ) (after the tribe of Quraysh) is the 106th chapter of the Qur'an. It is a Makkah sura that consists of four ayat. It urges the Quraysh tribe who dominated Mecca to serve Allah, who had protected them, for the sake of their own future. == Other websites == * Quraysh at Sacred Texts * Quraysh at Altafsir.com Category:Chapters in the Quran
title: Quraysh (surah)
